articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: China's 'iPhone City' Under COVID Lockdown After Violent Clashes - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: Authorities set up barriers around 'high-risk' apartment buildings and checkpoints to restrict travel
articles.content:
Six million people were under COVID lockdown on Friday in a Chinese city home to the world's largest iPhone factory, after clashes between police and workers furious over pay.
Authorities have order… [+3220 chars]
